description: Jewel IGap is the interface used by Jewel Layouts that implement gaps.

members.description: Assigns variable gap in steps of GAP_STEP. You have available GAPS*GAP_STEP gap styles Activate "gap-{X}x{GAP_STEP}px" effect selector to set a numeric gap between elements. i.e: gap-2x3px will result in a gap of 6px
